hr.p: Good evening, Due to the executive order of North Dakota Governor Doug Burgum, as well as prudent action on the part of public education in North Dakota, we are closing school for grades PK-12 from Monday, March 16 through Friday, March 20, 2020, due to ongoing concerns of the Coronavirus (COVID-19). We will continue to provide further communication on our district website, mobile app, and school Facebook page as new information becomes available.

As of March 13, 2020 – 2:45 pm Due to the Emergency Declaration issued by President Trump, the NDHSAA will suspend play at the 2020 NDHSAA Class A State Basketball Tournament and the 2020 NDHSAA Class B Boys Basketball State Tournament. In addition to the 2020 NDHSAA State Tournaments being suspended, all remaining fine arts and spring sports seasons have been suspended indefinitely, which includes practices and game contests. Further information will be released as it becomes available.
